name: 10 Questions: Words within words that start with TR Multiple Choice Quiz | Brain Teasers

questions.text:
The question layout is as described below:

TR + A clue for the 'word within the word' = A clue for the combined word. 

The answer is the combined word.

TR + A card worth either 1 or 11 = An extremely small amount of a food substance.
TR + The process of doing something = The pulling power of an engine.
TR + The conclusion of an event = The current style.
TR + The remains of a fire = To completely destroy.
TR + More than enough = To walk all over something.
TR + To consume food = A positive incentive or reward.
TR + To cause pain = A pathway.
TR + The shortened version of a device that makes music louder = A layabout or homeless person.
TR + Frozen water = A very short period of time.
TR + An imperial unit of mass = To beat severely.
